metadata.title: CVE-2016-2423 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: server/telecom/CallsManager.java in Telephony in Android 4.x before 4.4.4,5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-04-01 does notproperly consider whether a device is provisioned, which allows physicallyproximate attackers to bypass the Factory Reset Protection protectionmechanism and delete data via unspecified vectors, aka internal bug26303187.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
